data.title: Argan Business Park
data.text:
ARGAN Business Park is a fully-integrated business facility catering to small and large local and international companies doing business in Kuwait. The Park is fully equipped with an advanced IT system, a fully-serviced health club and a 100-seat auditorium. The development responds to the needs of companies with green aspirations or credentials. The Park is home to developer ALARGAN International, and is Kuwaitâs first Platinum LEED certified building.

Tenants

Whether youâre a startup or a large corporation, ARGAN Business Park provides office spaces and services that respond to your business needs. Contact us to learn more about our offerings.

ALARGAN Project Management Company

Established in 2007, ALARGAN Real Estate Project Management Company is specialized in designing and building sustainable, practical, and fully-integrated spaces and facilities. With a team of highly qualified engineers and architects, the company has constructed various types of projects, ranging from luxury resorts to affordable residential developments, as well as commercial, hospitality and educational facilities. A subsidiary of ALARGAN International Real Estate, the company is positioned as a âone-stop-shopâ project manager of the group, planning, sourcing and building all types of developments.

ALARGAN Gulf Real Estate Services Company

ALARGAN Gulf Real Estate Services Company was established in 2007 and is an affiliate of ALARGAN International Real Estate Company. The company was established to accommodate the sales, leasing and property management departments of ALARGAN International Real Estate, which were restructured as an independent and separate entity thanks to their excellent performance and track record. ALARGAN Gulf Real Estate Services has positioned itself as a leader in its field since its inception and has delivered significant results in a short period. The company specializes in projects marketing, sales and leasing. The Company has expanded operations to Kuwait, the Sultanate of Oman, and the Kingdom of Bahrain.

ALARGAN Landscaping Company

The company provides complete landscaping solutions, from small courtyards to those of large commercial projects. ALARGAN Landscaping Companyâs main goal is to deliver an exquisite, finished result that is ideal to the customerâs wishes. Regardless of the size of the project, the company endeavors to provide superior customer service and an ongoing engagement with each and every client.

ALARGAN Logistics and Services

ALARGAN Logistics and Services (ALS) offers superior logistics management services that provide customers with a competitive advantage. ALS has developed an extensive and sophisticated database and an unsurpassed tracking system to provide customized services. With service as the base, technology as the tool and teamwork as the driving force, ALS exceeds the needs of its customers.

Back Yard Restaurant & CafÃ©

Back Yard displays a wide variety of distinctive and creative gastronomy inspired from the four corners of the world. The fusion of cuisines is sure to tantalize your taste. Every dish has its unique profile of flavors. The menu includes exclusive appetizers and sensational salads to start with, savory main dishes, aromatic tangy soups, rich sandwiches, and flavorful deserts to end with, not to mention the signature drinks and mocktails that are not overly sweet and have a powerful, ritzy flavor.

LEED Certification

ALARGAN International Real Estate Company is the first company in Kuwait to become a member of the United States Green Building Council (USGBC) as well as the countryâs first company to obtain the Platinum ranking for the Leadership in Energy & Environmental Design (LEED) program, which is awarded by USGBC. â

In-line with ALARGANâs Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) strategy, environmental awareness is an integral part of the ARGAN Business Park concept. The complex is designed to accommodate the highest level of technological capabilities while including environmentally-friendly features. The philosophy of ARGAN Business Park is to create a balance between what we require in modern business and how we can preserve our environment.
